The 7 Steps to Safely Ship Hazmat by Air

09 Jul 2024

Transporting hazardous materials by air is a highly regulated and intricate process that demands careful planning and strict compliance with regulations. Every year, more than 1.25 million dangerous goods shipments are transported by air. With air cargo growth predicted at 4.9% every year over the next 5 years, the number of dangerous goods shipments will […]

24 Jun 2024

Live coral shipment transported by Amerijet Honduras to Miami for the the University of Miami’s Rosenstiel School of Marine, Atmospheric, and Earth Science efforts to save Florida’s dying coral reefs. “This could not have happened without the support from the all-star team at Amerijet,” said professor of marine biology Andrew Baker, who also hitched a […]

Amerijet Air Cargo Charter Services: Heavy Freight to Remote Locations

17 Jun 2024

In today’s global economy, the need to transport heavy freight to remote locations is more critical than ever. Industries ranging from construction to mining, oil and gas, and even humanitarian aid require efficient and reliable transportation solutions. Amerijet Air Cargo Charter Services steps in to fill this vital role, offering specialized air cargo services that […]
